title: Relationship Manager (Service List)  Remote | PH Timezone
job_overview:
About the Role
We’re seeking a proactive and people-oriented Relationship Manager to join our fast-growing team. In this role, you’ll act as the bridge between our brand and potential collaborators, playing a key part in fostering trust, building lasting connections, and driving growth.
If you're a great communicator who thrives on relationship-building and loves outreach that feels human—not robotic—you’ll feel right at home.

What You’ll Do:
• Build and maintain relationships with partners and professionals across various industries.
• Use your charm and wit (plus great follow-ups) to spark genuine conversations via email, LinkedIn, and other platforms.
• Organize leads and outreach progress using internal tracking systems.
• Collaborate with a small and supportive team to hit daily and weekly outreach goals.
• Work independently with accountability and structure, but never feel like you're on your own.

Requirements:
• Excellent written and spoken English communication
• Confident and professional email etiquette (no templates here—you know how to make things sound human)
• Strong attention to detail and ability to organize data clearly
• Fast learner with the ability to adapt and improve outreach processes
• Has a capable laptop/desktop, stable internet, working headset or mic, and 720p+ webcam

Perks & Benefits:
• Recognition: Compete for monthly awards, earn badges, and get recognized for your excellence.
• Friendly culture: Be part of a chill team that works hard and laughs harder. Join team activities and even e-sports events!
• Growth opportunities: Learn new skills, get mentored by professionals, and challenge yourself to grow.
• Fully remote: Work from the comfort of your home or wherever your favorite coffee shop is.
• Maternity/paternity leave: Paid leave so you can focus on what matters most.
• Competitions & challenges: Design contests and monthly competitions for extra bonuses.
• Stability: Low-turnover environment with long-term opportunities.
• Paid vacation: Earn vacation days monthly to relax and recharge.
• Mental health support: Free access to mental health and wellness support—because your well-being matters.
• Free training: Upskill in outreach, communication, systems, and more.
• Community vibe: Join a creative, diverse, and supportive team that feels more like a crew than a company.

Bonus Points If You:
• Have prior experience in sales, outreach, or virtual assistant roles
• Love experimenting with email subject lines and outreach hooks
• Enjoy the challenge of turning a “maybe” into a “yes!”

Ready to connect with people, grow your career, and make a real impact?
Apply now and be part of a team that values results, creativity, and great conversations.

How to Apply:
We don’t do generic. If you’ve read this far — prove it. ????
1. Fill out the official application form here:
Upgrade to see actual info

2. On the first question — “Please type the magic phrase” — enter:
 ibuildrelationships (or use the phrase given in your job post)

3. Attach your portfolio or relevant work samples when prompted.
